thread.title: Kohl’s Cardholders: Ninja Single-Serve Coffee Bar System Only $70 Shipped (Regularly $199)
thread.title_full: Kohl’s Cardholders: Ninja Single-Serve Coffee Bar System Only $70 Shipped (Regularly $199)

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s Cardholders: Ninja Single-Serve Coffee Bar System Only $70 Shipped (Regularly $199)

organizations.name: ninja coffee bar single-serve coffee bar system

text:
Starting today and running through March 26th, head over to Kohl’s.com where all you cardholders can save 30% off your entire purchase with the promo code LUCKY30 at checkout. AND, cardholders will score FREE shipping on every order with the code FS4MARCH at checkout.
If you’re not a cardholder, save an extra 15% off your entire purchase with code SAVE15 at checkout (expires 3/26). Shipping is free on any order of $75 or starts at $5.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pick up if available near you.
And starting today and through March 26th, you’ll get $10 in Kohl’s Cash for every $50 you spend. You can then use your earned Kohl’s Cash coupon from March 27th-April 2nd 

These promo codes make for some *HOT* buys on the Ninja Coffee Bar Single-Serve Coffee Bar System … Kohl’s Cardholders Deal: Ninja Coffee Bar Single-Serve Coffee Bar System $99.99 (reg. $199.99)
Enter the promo code LUCKY30 (30% off)
Enter the promo code FS4MARCH (free shipping)
Final cost $69.99 shipped!*
*PLUS, earn $10 in Kohl’s cash! 
Non-cardholders Deal: Ninja Coffee Bar Single-Serve Coffee Bar System $99.99 (reg. $199.99)
Enter the promo code SAVE15 (15% off)
Final cost $84.99 shipped!*
*PLUS, earn $10 in Kohl’s cash! 
This coffee bar system includes a Ninja XL Hot & cold Multi-Serve Tumbler, Built in frother, 40-recipe book, a Ninja Smart Scoop, a permanent reusable filter and a removable water reservoir!
